subject: AW: [junit] Running setUp once for all test (version 3.7)
messageBody:
Take a look at junit.extensions.TestSetup

> -----Ursprungliche Nachricht-----
> Von: Grant Lewis [mailto:lewis@...]
> Gesendet: Dienstag, 19. Juni 2001 18:38
> An: JUnit
> Betreff: [junit] Running setUp once for all test (version 3.7)
>
>
> Can somebody help explain to me how to run setup only once for all my
> tests using version 3.7 of junit. It doesn't appear as though the old
> approach documented in the FAQ is supported in the latest release.
>
> Grant
